agentData.mission: Reproduce and diagnose the recurring execution failure ('container lost after testing 0/50 files') by running the existing preflight diagnostics scripts (e.g., preflight_smoke.py, preflight_diagnostics.py) and capturing full environment/path/dependency output to runtime/_build/reports/preflight.json and runtime/_build/logs/preflight.log; propose concrete remediation steps (dependency pinning, path fixes, runtime constraints) in a short markdown note under runtime/_build/reports/execution_incident.md.
